tweet: Last month, I announced a permanent halt by the National Guard Bureau to a planned clawback of housing funds given to servicemembers stationed at Silverbell Army Heliport, & an increase in these funds for all eligible soldiers serving at the #AZ01 base. http://bit.ly/2yf5VJC

The passage of the Farm Bill is critical for rural America. We need to get this right. I have received great feedback from Arizonans, and I invite you to share your thoughts.  https://ohalleran.house.gov/farm-bill-feedback …

Partisanship shouldn't prevent elected officials from addressing important issues such as health care, immigration, & infrastructure. Bipartisan legislating & commonsense problem-solving are making a comeback, & #AZ01 will benefit from us working together.  http://bit.ly/2U6b0gG

This is unacceptable. Our veterans have served our country with honor and they deserve better than this. Latino students interested in a paid internship in Washington, DC can apply for the Congressional Hispanic Caucus Institute's Congressional Internship Program until December 10. This program is a great opportunity for students in Arizona! #AZ01 Learn more: https://chci.org/programs/congressional-internship-program/ …

I've had some great interns from AZ work in my office. Join me in congratulating Matthew for receiving the Thomas R. Pickering Foreign Affairs Fellowship, which funds grad school for students preparing to enter the U.S. Foreign Service. #AZ01 Read: https://asunow.asu.edu/20181128-asu-senior-matthew-jernstedt-wins-prestigious-pickering-foreign-affairs-fellowship …

I am focused on finding bipartisan solutions to clean up Washington, honor our veterans, and invest in the future of our country by creating jobs and focusing on infrastructure funding. #AZ01 pic.twitter.com/ce2CnTRP70

I am saddened to hear of the passing of Congressman Ed Pastor. He dedicated his life to serving the people of Arizona, and our communities are all the better for it. For too long, Washington has ignored the needs of hardworking Americans. I've traveled to every corner of #AZ01, meeting w/ seniors to discuss the issues impacting them, including the rising costs of health care & prescription drugs. I introduced the CAPS for Prescriptions Act to cap out-of-pocket costs Medicare beneficiaries pay. pic.twitter.com/GB5MkiodHF

This month we recognize the families who support our servicemembers every day. They are the backbone of our Armed Forces, silently, but passionately, serving every single day. Throughout the West, and across the country, communities are facing the effects of climate change every day. From larger, deadlier forest fires to crippling droughts, it is something that can no longer be brushed under the rug. #AZ01 http://bit.ly/2r6mbIO

Since coming to Congress, I've traveled tens of thousands of miles across #AZ01 and met hardworking folks in every corner of our great state. In the coming year, I look forward to visiting more towns and communities and hearing directly from folks on the issues important to them. pic.twitter.com/MyZRstgrk6

For too long, Washington has been out of touch with the needs of the American people. Last week, I was on CNN to discuss important reforms I want to see implemented that bring transparency and accountability to Congress and put our constituents first. #AZ01 pic.twitter.com/3kPgX3s5Nd

Every American has the right to vote, but for many in #AZ01 tribal communities, access to the voting booth is not always guaranteed. I cosponsored the Native American Voting Rights Act to work to ensure tribal communities are represented in Washington. http://bit.ly/2KyHziL

The opioid epidemic has touched countless lives across #AZ01. I'm pleased our bipartisan bill to combat this growing crisis was signed into law to implement concrete steps to begin dealing with this public health epidemic. http://bit.ly/2CEJ4tS

Arizona is home to more than 500k small businesses that support their communities and provide good-paying jobs to hardworking families. This #SmallBusinessSaturday I urge you to shop at locally owned businesses. #ShopSmall #AZ01 pic.twitter.com/sIR2iOt1WR
Stay up to date on my work for #AZ01 families by subscribing to my newsletter:  https://bit.ly/2Dz3bdl

I am thankful to spend time with my loved ones this #Thanksgiving, and I wish the same for you. 

From my family to yours, Happy Thanksgiving! #AZ01 pic.twitter.com/VHTPhabUC5

During the holiday season scammers target #AZ01 folks in an attempt to take their hard-earned savings. Visit my website to familiarize yourself with common scams and learn how you can protect yourself and your loved ones from fraud: https://bit.ly/2TvUGpg

#AZ01 residents living near Winslow and Springerville and having issues with their Social Security or Medicare can connect with my staff today at regular mobile office hours today. pic.twitter.com/PnHyGd5FJJ

Congress must pass a bipartisan #FarmBill that addresses the needs of our rural communities and our ag producers. I am proud to give #AZ01 farmers, ranchers, and communities a voice at the table as we negotiate. My staff work with #AZ01 seniors everyday to address issues they have with Social Security, Medicare, and other federal programs. Find a list of resources available to seniors on my website here: https://ohalleran.house.gov/helping-you/arizona-senior-resources …

I introduced the #NOPEAct to hold elected leaders accountable to their constituents. My bill would freeze salaries, ban taxpayer-funded first-class flights, and withhold congressional salaries if no budget is passed. #AZ01 pic.twitter.com/ei907bGQzC

I was on CNN to discuss reforms I want to see in the next Congress. For too long, Washington has been out of touch with the needs of the American people, and that must change. I'm calling on leaders to support reforms that bring transparency & accountability to Congress. #AZ01 pic.twitter.com/OjJWp102XE

Uranium mining throughout #AZ01, and especially near the Grand Canyon, has left a toxic wake of contamination and health issues that rural & tribal communities have been left to deal with. Congress must now fund the remediation of these abandoned sites. https://cronkitenews.azpbs.org/2018/10/01/supreme-court-lets-stand-ban-on-new-uranium-mines-around-grand-canyon/ …

There are no vet nursing homes on tribal lands, leaving many in #AZ01 w/o care. I introduced the Nursing Home Care for Native American Veterans Act to close a loophole that prevents vet homes built on tribal lands from receiving federal grant money. http://bit.ly/2qkVIFj

For too long, DC politicians have left the needs of rural America on the back burner. As Chairman of the Blue Dog Special Task Force on Rural America, I introduced our Strong Rural America Agenda to serve as a guideline for lawmakers to address the issues rural #AZ01 is facing. pic.twitter.com/C5akt5iyyL

Giving our returning vets opportunities to succeed by connecting them to in-demand career opportunities is a top priority of mine. I introduced the Solar VETS act to provide training for jobs in the solar industry to returning #AZ01 veterans. http://bit.ly/2trN8Z9

Our success as a nation depends on the hardworking folks in rural communities, & when they suffer, so does the rest of the country. The gridlock in DC does not reflect the values of #AZ01 or rural communities around the country – & that has to change. http://bit.ly/2PYyODU
I’ll be live on CNN soon to talk about my priorities in the new Congress and the latest issues of the day. #AZ01

Broadband is critical to the economic vitality of a region, but in #AZ01 many lack basic internet access. We must continue to expand broadband in rural areas to connect job seekers, students, & small businesses with the resources they need to succeed.  http://bit.ly/2BcwJvO

#AZ01 Medicare beneficiaries often live on a fixed income, & costs are forcing them to make the tough decision between life-saving care & drugs or putting food on the table. I introduced the CAPS for Prescriptions Act to cap out-of-pocket costs Medicare beneficiaries pay. pic.twitter.com/rr1BKnniQC

I wore purple this week to raise awareness for the world's deadliest major cancer. Only 9% of Americans with pancreatic cancer survive more than five years; research into cures and effective treatments must be prioritized. #AZ01 pic.twitter.com/dqWlaGJ9nq

CAMP VERDE: Having an issue with a federal program, such as veterans benefits or Social Security? Stop by the Camp Verde Library today from 9 am to 1 pm to speak with a caseworker on my #AZ01 staff and get the answers to your questions.

Rural construction projects have long been penalized by an outdated VA funding formula. I'm proud to have led congressional efforts to secure federal funding for new veterans homes in #AZ01 & will continue to work to hold to VA accountable on this issue. http://bit.ly/2HAJqkI

I offer my congratulations to Autumn Montoya, the newly crowned Miss Navajo Nation. This competition allows the Navajo people to engage w/ the rich tradition of their sovereign nation & celebrate young folks working to preserve their language & customs. https://n.pr/2zUyIDa

Due to the nature of their work & lack of treatment available, agricultural workers suffer from higher rates of depression & suicide. I introduced the STRESS Act to make mental health treatment more available for hardworking farmers & ranchers.  http://bit.ly/2N3sz0L

Retaliation & abuse of power have no place in public office. I'm pleased Gov Ducey will investigate allegations that AZ State Parks & Trails Director Sue Black disregarded procedures to minimize damage to protected cultural & historical sites. http://bit.ly/2qNjCes

Across #AZ01, Americans are falling victim to an epidemic that knows no boundaries. There is much work left to be done, but I am proud that our bipartisan bill to address this public health crisis was signed into law. http://bit.ly/2CEJ4tS

Every child in #AZ01 deserves a safe environment in which they can learn and grow, but in many rural areas that is not the reality. I introduced the Impact Aid Infrastructure Act to fund the construction of critical Impact Aid school projects. http://bit.ly/2zr9c9r

During Native American Heritage Month we celebrate the diverse traditions of Native communities. Traveling throughout Indian Country, I’ve met kind, resilient folks & seen firsthand the importance of preserving the culture & sovereignty of Native nations. #AZ01 pic.twitter.com/SOwX1VdPPk

Today caseworkers on my staff are at the Gila County Courthouse in #AZ01 to assist you with any issues you may be having with federal programs, including Social Security, Medicare, and veterans benefits. Stop by from 10 am to 1 pm to get the answers to your questions. pic.twitter.com/EV17rmWNft
